Quick search

sphinx_click_ext¶

modify sphinx_click for more consistent behavior in html docs and –help

usage: in sphinx docs/conf.py add to extensions (list): ‘clasp.sphinx_click_ext’

class clasp.sphinx_click_ext.ClaspClickDirective(name, arguments, options, content, lineno, content_offset, block_text, state, state_machine)[source]¶
